title: Fix your sh*t RIOT
body: Holy shit dude this happens to me WAY too many times. Every time I play fucking Udyr I get Bugsplat as soon as the loading screen launches. I keep fucking pressing the reconnect button and I get Bugsplat EVERY fucking time. I've sent multiple reports (of course nothing is done about it, it's RIOT we're talking about), the reason I'm so fucking heated is because I'M IN A QUEUE FOR BUGSPLAT THAT I HAVE NO CONTROL OVER. Come on RIOT. FIX. YOUR. SHIT. {{summoner:1}}

replies.body:
This **only** occurs when you play Udyr? Most Bugsplats are caused by system driver or hardware issues, so I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) so you can ensure this isn't caused by some common factors.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.

If you have WINDOWS 10 and your XBOX application is running, enter it and look through the settings. When you get into the settings look for anything named Game DVR and disable it. Once disabled, you can play any game that was started to crash out of nowhere, league of legends included. try that<< not my words
